statements: DELETE FROM CustomerFeedbackSentiments WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND sentiment_score > 0.7;
DELETE FROM CustomerFeedbackSentiments WHERE analyzed_date < '2022-01-01' AND feedback_text LIKE '%excellent%';
DELETE FROM TrendAnalysisReports WHERE report_date < DATE '2022-10-01' AND report_id NOT IN (SELECT analysis_id FROM CustomerAnalysisResults);
DELETE FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customer_details WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customer_feedback_sentiments WHERE feedback_id = 100 AND customer_id = 200
